long_description: Roomy without unnecessary weight, the GoLite TraveLite Upright 30" Wheeled Luggage holds all you need for an extended trip to Africa or Alaska, and can take a beating in the carousel. Built of backpack fabric that's lightweight yet strong, and reinforced at key points. Oversize, smooth-rolling wheels have reinforced axles. Sturdy telescoping handle with ergonomic grip. Padded grab straps double as minimalist backpack straps for short-haul trips. Book-style main opening. 1 full-length internal pocket and 2 internal lid pockets. Internal and external compression straps. Padded top grab handle; durable bottom grab handle/foot. GoLite TraveLite Upright 30" Wheeled Luggage has a built-in luggage tag. Closeout.
short_description: Roomy without unnecessary weight, the GoLite TraveLite Upright 30" Wheeled Luggage holds all you need for an extended trip to Africa or Alaska, and can take a beating in the carousel.
